name: Walk the Horizon
description:
Controls - WASD Moves - Spacebar Jumps - Z or LMB Attack

You live in an alien world, defeat your masters to rule it.

Credits - ChessType Font - Carl - https://www.1001fonts.com/chesstype-font.html
Glitch Brushes - dataerase - https://dataerase.itch.io/
Godot CRT Shader - perons - https://perons.itch.io/godot-crt-shader
Reflections - Airvikar - https://www.youtube.com/user/Airvikar
1-Bit Side-Scroller Tile Set - AblazePython - https://ablazepython.itch.io/1-bit-ss-ts
Platformer Code - An Abundance of Death
Pixel Art Forest - edermunizz - https://edermunizz.itch.io/

Crew -

Programmer - Kaizar Nike - @KaizarNike
